---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /staking/near/transfer/get-flow-status-transferred
---

To get the current state of the existing flow, send a `GET` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]` using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://near-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/5f0962d5-fba0-453c-bf35-0dad79624b59' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `transfer_tx_broadcasting` to `transferred`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {3}
{
  "id": "79d4a437-e964-4f90-ba19-998d0de8c1cb",
  "state": "transfered",
  "actions": [],
  "data": {
    "from_account_pubkey": "ed25519:NUbTcj78nHFFm1J8a1GFjenAnCKV32ZdBeeqem8oyLV",
    "from_account_address": "0b81cc09294fc074814ad0de50f31644e5669f856105399b.testnet",
    "to_account_address": "slate-demo.testnet",
    "amount": "50.0",
    "transfer_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "87050c63e63a1269228176a458743c99d23ca12ad9c9758a42c10e56799dc8c3",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "A64WEYru3xv7jQsCDn9JV4RYK4frvNWtfAUUMYQmcVLn",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    }
  },
  "network_code": "near",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2023-02-27T18:35:44.613Z",
  "updated_at": "2023-02-27T18:44:24.567Z"
}
```

### Token Transfer Flow Complete

Congratulations, you have successfully transferred your tokens!
